resource-type-sql-windows-setup-descript: Run SQL Server on Windows, select a version to get started.

arc.control.plane.project.details.descri: Select the subscription tto manage deployed resources and costs. Use resource groups like folders to organize and manage all your resources.
arc.control.plane.data.controller.detail: Provide and Azure region and a name for your Azure Arc data controller. This name will be used to identify your Arc location for remote management and monitoring.
